Hotkeys:

Ctrl + V -> load an image
Drag and drop -> load an image
Escape -> Exit
Space -> Pan image
Mouse Wheel or Z/X -> Zoom in/out
+/- or A/S or Ctrl + Mouse Wheel -> Alter opacity
D -> Set image to default size
F -> Flip image horizontal
V -> Flip image vertical
R -> Move window to mouse
T -> Set window size to mouse
Q -> Lock mouse interaction (Window can still be focused and is not click-through)
W -> Unlock mouse interaction
